content.processed:
Information for Erasmus participants

On this infographic, you will find options for the continuation of student university mobility. They show different situations and impacts on financial support for trips.

Trips abroad - current options

On the Erasmus website you will find a clear map of countries allowing the entry of foreigners. The situation in individual countries is changing dynamically, so always check the information here.

Also, contact the relevant foreign school or institution before the planned trip, and check whether the lessons are taking place and what the current conditions are.

You can send questions about Erasmus here: info@dzs.cz
